name: Memory Game
description: A memory game - don't click the same image twice!

name: News Scraper
description: This app scrapes headlines from The Guardian's website, and lets users save their own annotations.

name: FriendFinder
description: A full-stack "find-your-best-match" app. Could Elton be your platonic soulmate?

description: An online multiplayer game. In case you're the only one here, you might want to open it in multiple windows.

name: Buffy Quiz
description: A trivia game - how well do you know one of my favourite shows? I coded the animation by hand with CSS, no libraries included.
